summary: Comprehensive testing of Engineering Student Success Platform completed. All backend API endpoints working correctly. Frontend UI tested with modern glassmorphic design - all pages and interactions verified. Fixed one minor backend bug (JWT error handling).

minor.issue: Was returning 500 instead of 401 for invalid tokens - FIXED by changing jwt.JWTError to jwt.InvalidTokenError

integration_issues.issue: Returns 404 for new users without matches (expected behavior, not a bug)

critical_code_review_comments: JWT_SECRET should be stored securely and be at least 32 bytes (currently 27 bytes warning shown)
All AI features (company matching, resume evaluation, interview feedback, YouTube recommendations) are SIMULATED with keyword-based algorithms - not real ML models
seed_data_creation: Backend test created new test users with TEST_ prefix for CRUD testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working. 30 backend tests pass. Frontend has 6 main navigation tabs: Dashboard, Projects, Prep Zone, Mock Interviews, Companies, Profile. Company matching requires user to generate profile first. Resume evaluator accepts PDF/DOCX files.
mocked_api_note: ALL AI FEATURES ARE SIMULATED - Company matching uses keyword-based scoring, Resume evaluation uses keyword analysis, Interview feedback uses rule-based analysis, YouTube recommendations are pre-configured lists. No real ML/AI integration.
frontend_pages_tested: Dashboard with recent projects, tasks, quiz stats
Projects page with CRUD and Kanban board
Companies with profile matching, resume evaluator, job applications
